channel.title: Dan's personal page
channel.description: Recent content on Dan's personal page

item.title: About me
item.description: Education King Mongkut’s Institute of Technology Ladkrabang, Bangkok B.Eng in Software engineering 2016 - 2020 International Software Engineering Program, Faculty of Engineering. Hard Skills Programming in C/C++, C#, Java, Python and HTML / JavaScript. Game and product development using Unity and Godot Engine. Version Control using GitHub. Software design and requirement analysis. 3D Graphics using Blender. Experience with operating Windows and Linux based systems. Embedded systems development and IoT development.

item.title: SenseStack
item.description: SenseStack is an open source IoT sensor platform for environmental data collection. I was the firmware developer for the project. I’ll add more details as I have time. This site is still under construction!
